description: The pair reunited in very different surroundings, one month after being released from the jungle, as they partied at E!'s watch along party at St Martin's Lane Hotel in the British capital on Sunday.
title: Jorgie Porter reunites with George Shelley for Golden Globes 2016 party
title_page: Jorgie Porter reunites with George Shelley forÂ Golden Globes 2016 party | Daily Mail Online
text:
They may not have been walking the red carpet at LA's prestigious Golden Globes ceremony, but Jorgie Porter and George Shelley certainly put in the glamour at the London-based viewing party.
Jorgie traded Hollyoaks for her taste of Hollywood glamour in a slinky jade gown as she hung off the arm of former I'm A Celeb campmate George.
The pair reunited in very different surroundings, one month after being released from the jungle, as they partied at E!'s watch along party at St Martin's Lane Hotel in the British capital on Sunday.
Scroll down for video
Reunited: Jorgie Porter and George Shelley reunited at E!'s Golden Globe awards watch along party at London's St Martin's Lane Hotel on Sunday night
The viewing party celebrated Hollywood's finest as the acting elite turned out in Los Angeles for the annual awards ceremony.
But on the other side of the pond, the British stars were enjoying all of the glamour with a champagne and red carpet reception in honour of the start of awards season.
On the guest list, Jorgie was looking incredible in her plunging gown; her golden tresses tossed over one shoulder to soften her open cleavage.
Hollywood glamour: The petite blonde traded Hollyoaks for a taste of Hollywood glamour
Slinky: She plumped for a slinky jade-green dress that featured a plunging neckline and high leg split
With a leg slipping through her daringly-high side split, the blonde showed off a greater hint at her shape.
Jorgie had two dates on her arm that night, thanks to George's Union J bandmate Jaymi Hensley, who looked equally sharp.
The former X Factor stars both plumped for jeans with their smart jackets - something they wouldn't have got away with at the Beverly Hilton - and Jaymi went for a bare collar look.
Union jade! Jorgie was sandwiched between Union J's George (left) and bandmate Jaymi Hensley in her slinky jade-coloured gown
New pals: The blonde hung out with George's bandmate with champagne flutes in hand
They sandwiched in petite actress Jorgie, towering over her with champagne flutes in hand for the occasion.
Jorgie's new relationship with Luther Burrell was recently confirmed when they shared a kissing picture on Instagram.
Back in November 2015, a spokesperson for Jorgie confirmed the pair were dating but denied that anything more serious was going on and there was confusion over whether she went into the jungle as a single woman.
George, meanwhile, called things off with fellow camp star Ferne McCann less than a month after they claimed to be 'in love'
Cutie: She was among the stars celebrated in London and living vicariously through the moviestars
Party time: The Mancunian was enjoying a visit to London without her hunky boyfriend Luther Burrell
